posts.post_content:
Anybody have any to trade or sell?  I am looking for the following in particular:

Dooin
Fromme
Graham
Gray

I don't have a ton of spare cash at the moment, so I'm not the guy for your PSA 6 cards right now.  I'm more in the market for Pr-Vg.  I'm on the road at the moment, so be patient if you send me a note.  Thanks!

Take Care,
Geno
